### Example 1

Solve the following system:

$$
\begin{cases}
3x - 2y = 8 \\
x + 4y = -3
\end{cases}
$$

### Example 2

Solve the system simultaneously:

$$ \begin{cases}
3x - y + z = b_1 \\
-x + 2y + 3z = b_2 \\
x - 4z = b_3
\end{cases} $$

a)

$$ \begin{cases}
b_1 = 1 \\
b_2 = -1 \\
b_3 = 7
\end{cases} $$

b)

$$ \begin{cases}
b_1 = -2 \\
b_2 = 3 \\
b_3 = 1
\end{cases} $$
